sentences.en: An ague in the spring is physic for a king.
sentences.cn: 春天一场病,一年不服药.

sentences.en: Cried Jabez Stone , in an ague of fear.
sentences.cn: 杰贝兹·斯通吓得直哆嗦叫出声来了.

sentences.en: He shivered as with an ague.
sentences.cn: 他一身发抖就像患虐疾.

sentences.en: He took down with fever and ague.
I often ague with my friends about the problem.
sentences.cn: 我经常和朋友辩论那个问题.

sentences.en: Quartan ague kills old men, and cures young.
sentences.cn: 三日疟,青年能治好, 老人见阎王.

words.tran_cn: 疟疾的；患了疟疾的；易患疟疾的

trans.tran_cn: 疟疾，冷颤，发冷，寒战，疟状热
